content.rendered:
2022 Champions League Final Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including three nights hotel stay, entry level tickets, roundtrip airport transfers, and more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackageRoom CategoryPackages From
Renaissance Paris RépubliqueStandard Room$13,925
Grand Hotel du Palais RoyalSuperior RoomSOLD OUT
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% non-refundable deposit is required to secure your package. Final package balances will be due 4 months prior to travel. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
